title: Program Manager, Data Center Environmental, Health, and Safety (English, German)
description: A problem isn’t truly solved until it’s solved for all. As a Program Manager at Google, you’ll lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish. Our goal is to build a Google that looks like the world around us and we want Googlers to stay and grow when they join us.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Occupational Health and Safety, a related field, or equivalent practical experience. An occupational safety specialist qualification for Germany based on ASiG and DGUV regulations. 2 years of experience in program or project management. Experience with Environmental, Health and Safety management including management of EHS compliance for industrial facilities. Experience managing environmental programs. Ability to communicate in English and German fluently.
preferred_qualifications: Credentials from Board of Certified Safety Professionals, NEBOSH or equivalent agencies. Experience communicating with Federal, State and Local Authorities regarding EHS issues. Experience with Data Center or other electrical safety industry. Ability to coach, influence, and advise local employees to achieve positive EHS outcomes. Excellent collaboration, project management, and communication skills.
responsibilities: Identify, organize, and lead program activities and stakeholders within the EHS domain. Collaborate effectively with internal and external stakeholders to ensure safety and compliance. Maintain environmental permits/programs for compliance. Assess EHS training needs and manage the regional portfolio of EHS initiatives and programs.
